data.prompt:
Magic: The Gathering card art.

Final Prompt: Illustrate a breathtaking, vibrant nebula-sea sanctuary: a vast expanse of intricate, bioluminescent coral formations pulsating with pure, swirling green mana. Unique, glowing cosmic flora and small alien creatures teem within this celestial reef, which floats as a pristine oasis amidst the deep blues and purples of the cosmic void. In the far distance, a subtle silhouette of a Wayfinder canoe-ship or a lone Merfolk figure suggests a protected haven.

Artist Credit: inspired by Julie Dillon

Style: Fantasy illustration, detailed, painterly, dramatic lighting.
Do NOT include any text, card frames, or UI elements.
Focus on the subject matter only.
